Creates a new authenticated connection factory which will obtain connections using the provided connection factory and immediately perform the provided Bind request.
AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedAsynchronousConnection - Class in org.opends.sdk
An authenticated asynchronous connection supports all operations except Bind operations.
AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedConnection - Class in org.opends.sdk
An authenticated synchronous connection supports all operations except Bind operations.
AUTHORIZATION_DENIED - Static variable in class org.opends.sdk.ResultCode
The result code that should be used if the server will not allow the client to use the requested authorization.
AuthorizationIdentityControl - Class in org.opends.sdk.controls
This class implements the authorization identity control as defined in RFC 3829.

AuthorizationIdentityControl.Request - Class in org.opends.sdk.controls
This class implements the authorization identity request control as defined in RFC 3829.
